entry_requirements_raw.A-Level: Pass GCE A-level with minimum one (1) Grade B and two (2) Grade C’s (including Mathematics).
entry_requirements_raw.UEC: Pass UEC with five (5) Grade B’s including Mathematics and a pass in English.
entry_requirements_raw.Diploma:
Pass Diploma in Accounting or related field from recognised institutions with minimum CGPA 2.50.  SPM-level or equivalent:
credit in Mathematics
pass in English
entry_requirements_raw.STPM:
Pass STPM or equivalent with minimum Grade C+ (CGPA 2.33) in any two (2) subjects.  SPM-level or equivalent:
credit in Mathematics
pass in English
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation:
Pass Foundation from recognised institutions with minimum CGPA 2.50.  SPM-level or equivalent:
credit in Mathematics
pass in English

course_content.core: Year 1 Semester 1 Management & Practises Introductory Financial Accounting Business Law Microeconomics Quantitative Methods for Business Decisions Semester 2 Intermediate Financial Accounting and Reporting I Introductory Management Accounting and Control Organizational Behaviour Accounting Information Systems Company Law Macroeconomics Semester 3 Appreciation of Ethics and Civilisations (Local student)/Bahasa Melayu Komunikasi 2 (International student) Philosophy and Current Issues (Local student & International student) Co-curriculum University Compulsory Subject 1 University Compulsory Subject 2 (Bahasa Kebangsaan) Year 2 Semester 1 Intermediate Financial Accounting and Reporting II Intermediate Management Accounting and Control Financial Management Analysis and Design of Accounting Information System Introduction to Taxation Elective Semester 2 Intermediate Financial Accounting and Reporting II Intermediate Management Accounting and Control Auditing and Assurance 1 Corporate Finance Intermediate Taxation Elective Semester 3 Integrity and Anti-Curruption Entrepreneurial Skills University Compulsory Subject 3 University Compulsory Subject 4 University Compulsory Subject 5 Year 3 Semester 1 Advanced Financial Accounting and Reporting II Advanced Taxation Auditing and Assurance I & II Strategic Management Public Sector Accounting Financial Market and Institutions Semester 2 Industrial Training and Reporting Semester 3 Corporate Governance & Ethics Integrated Case Studies Elective

entry_requirements_raw.Diploma: A Diploma in Computer Science OR Software Engineering OR Information Technology OR Information Systems or equivalent with a minimum CGPA of 2.50 OR Any other Diploma in science and technology with a minimum CGPA of 2.50.
entry_requirements_raw.STPM: A pass in STPM in Science Stream with a minimum Grade C (GP 2.00) in a Mathematics subject and a Science/ICT subject.
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation:
A pass in Foundation studies with minimum CGPA of 2.00.  SPM-level or equivalent:
credit in Additional Mathematics OR Mathematics and one of the subjects in Science, Technology or Engineering

credit in BM
pass in English

programs.program_name: Bachelor of Arts (Hons) in Creative Digital Media

entry_requirements_raw.UEC: Pass UEC with at least a B grade in 5 subjects.
entry_requirements_raw.Diploma: Creative Multimedia Diploma with a minimum CGPA of 2.5 (candidates with CGPA below 2.50 but above 2.00 may be subject to internal evaluation process).
entry_requirements_raw.STPM: Pass STPM or equivalent with at least a Grade C (NGMP 2.0) in 2 subjects.
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation: Pass Foundation from any IPTA / IPTS / Institution that is allowed to offer foundation program with CGPA of 2.00.

course_content.core: Year 1 Semester 1 Design Context Digital Drawing for Character Animation Digital Imagery Fundamental Digital Photography University Compulsory Subject 1 University Compulsory Subject 2 (Bahasa Kebangsaan) Screenwriting Concept Semester 2 Graphic Media and Communication 3D Modeling Environment Design Digital Character Concept Production Process Compositing Fundamental Year 2 Semester 1 Interactive Design Action Analysis Design for Animation Digital Sculpting Digital Composting 1 & 2 Entrepreneurship Skills Semester 2 Academic Research Fundamental Advertising Effect Audio Composition Digital Cinematography Digital Compositing 2 University Compulsory Subject 3 Semester 3 Bahasa Melayu Komunikasi 2 (International student) Penghayatan Etika dan Peradaban (Appreciation of Ethics and Civilisations) (Local student) (Local student) Malaysian Economy Falsafah dan Isu Semasa (Philosophy and Current Issues) Year 3 Semester 1 Digital Motion Graphic Research Project 1 Elective 1 Elective 2 Co-curriculum Semester 2 Research Project 1 Elective 3 Elective 4 University Compulsory Subject 4 University Compulsory Subject 5 Semester 3 Industrial Training

UEC.text: Pass UEC with at least a B grade in 5 subjects.

Diploma.text: Creative Multimedia Diploma with a minimum CGPA of 2.5 (candidates with CGPA below 2.50 but above 2.00 may be subject to internal evaluation process).

STPM.text: Pass STPM or equivalent with at least a Grade C (NGMP 2.0) in 2 subjects.

Foundation.text: Pass Foundation from any IPTA / IPTS / Institution that is allowed to offer foundation program with CGPA of 2.00.
